maintenance.title: Website Maintenance
maintenance.description_1: This page continues to be updated as the design improves.
maintenance.description_2: We expect to release our website by the end of the year.

error.title: There's a problem
error.desc: Something has gone wrong with your request

meta.title: Latest news, guides, and technology updates
meta.description: Latest news, and advice in technology. From emerging, and cutting-edge, technologies, to industry-leading, and established, companies. Learn how to protect your security and privacy while staying ahead in the tech world.

page.pp_p1: We value privacy and respect those who visit our website. No identifiable information is stored or accessed without your permission to ensure that we do not infringe upon your privacy.
page.pp_p2: Because our site contains links to third-party websites, we cannot prevent tracking outside of our domain.
page.pp_p3: Apart from usage data which your browser provides (User-Agent) nothing is collected

privacy-policy.description: See our Privacy Policy and how it could relate to you

button.NewWindow: The link will open in a new window or tab

landing.title: Our latest blog posts
landing.desc: Privacy, Security and everything in between.

meta.title: Latest Blog Posts
meta.description: Xanzhu provides helpful articles, guides and tips on all things technology. Focusing on privacy, security and more.

home.feature-desc: News, guides and reviews on technology, how to use it and how to ensure your data remains is protected online.
home.landing-desc: Xanzhu is a platform for sharing knowledge. Help set the standard for the next generation of privacy and accessibility. Teaches how to use technology and stay safe online.
